trans-unit.source: Module Descriptions
trans-unit.target: Module Descriptions

trans-unit.source: Machine Learning Module Descriptions
trans-unit.target: Machine Learning Module Descriptions

trans-unit.source: The machine learning libraries provided in Azure Machine Learning Studio are encapsulated in modules, each performing a task common in machine learning scenarios.
trans-unit.target: The machine learning libraries provided in Azure Machine Learning Studio are encapsulated in modules, each performing a task common in machine learning scenarios.

trans-unit.source: By connecting and then configuring modules, you can create a workflow that reads data from external sources, prepares it for analysis, applies machine learning algorithms, and generates results.
trans-unit.target: By connecting and then configuring modules, you can create a workflow that reads data from external sources, prepares it for analysis, applies machine learning algorithms, and generates results.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to drag and drop modules to create a machine learning experiment, see these tutorials:
trans-unit.target: For more information about how to drag and drop modules to create a machine learning experiment, see these tutorials:

trans-unit.source: Develop a predictive solution by using Azure Machine Learning
trans-unit.target: Develop a predictive solution by using Azure Machine Learning

trans-unit.source: Create a simple experiment in Azure Machine Learning Studio
trans-unit.target: Create a simple experiment in Azure Machine Learning Studio

trans-unit.source: Module Categories
trans-unit.target: Module Categories

trans-unit.source: The machine learning tools or modules in Azure Machine Learning Studio are grouped by the following categories.
trans-unit.target: The machine learning tools or modules in Azure Machine Learning Studio are grouped by the following categories.

trans-unit.source: Category
trans-unit.target: Category

trans-unit.source: Data Format conversions
trans-unit.target: Data Format conversions

trans-unit.source: Use these modules to convert data to one of the formats used by other machine learning tools or formats.
trans-unit.target: Use these modules to convert data to one of the formats used by other machine learning tools or formats.

trans-unit.source: Data Input and Output
trans-unit.target: Data Input and Output

trans-unit.source: Use these modules to read data from cloud data sources, including Hadoop clusters, Azure table storage, and Web URLs.
trans-unit.target: Use these modules to read data from cloud data sources, including Hadoop clusters, Azure table storage, and Web URLs.

trans-unit.source: Data Transformation
trans-unit.target: Data Transformation

trans-unit.source: Use these modules to prepare data for analysis.
trans-unit.target: Use these modules to prepare data for analysis.

trans-unit.source: You can change data types, flag columns as features or labels, generate features, and scale or normalize data, and much more.
trans-unit.target: You can change data types, flag columns as features or labels, generate features, and scale or normalize data, and much more.

trans-unit.source: Filter
trans-unit.target: Filter

trans-unit.source: Transform numeric data derived from digital signal processing.
trans-unit.target: Transform numeric data derived from digital signal processing.

trans-unit.source: Learning With Counts
trans-unit.target: Learning With Counts

trans-unit.source: Use joint probability distributions to build features that compactly describe large datasets.
trans-unit.target: Use joint probability distributions to build features that compactly describe large datasets.

trans-unit.source: Manipulation
trans-unit.target: Manipulation

trans-unit.source: This group provides a variety of tools for data science: remove or replace missing values, choose a subset of columns, add column or concatenate two datasets, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: This group provides a variety of tools for data science: remove or replace missing values, choose a subset of columns, add column or concatenate two datasets, and so forth.

trans-unit.source: Sample and Split
trans-unit.target: Sample and Split

trans-unit.source: Divide a dataset by criteria or by size, to create training and test sets, or to isolate certain rows.
trans-unit.target: Divide a dataset by criteria or by size, to create training and test sets, or to isolate certain rows.

trans-unit.source: Scale and Reduce
trans-unit.target: Scale and Reduce

trans-unit.source: Transform numerical data.
trans-unit.target: Transform numerical data.

trans-unit.source: Feature Selection
trans-unit.target: Feature Selection

trans-unit.source: Use these modules to identify the best features in your data, using widely researched statistical methods.
trans-unit.target: Use these modules to identify the best features in your data, using widely researched statistical methods.

trans-unit.source: Machine Learning
trans-unit.target: Machine Learning

trans-unit.source: This group contains most of the machine learning algorithms supported by Azure Machine Learning.
trans-unit.target: This group contains most of the machine learning algorithms supported by Azure Machine Learning.

trans-unit.source: It also contains modules intended to support the algorithms by training models, generating scores, and evaluating model performance.
trans-unit.target: It also contains modules intended to support the algorithms by training models, generating scores, and evaluating model performance.

trans-unit.source: Evaluate
trans-unit.target: Evaluate

trans-unit.source: After you have trained a model, use these tools to measure the model’s accuracy.
trans-unit.target: After you have trained a model, use these tools to measure the model’s accuracy.

trans-unit.source: Initialize
trans-unit.target: Initialize

trans-unit.source: These modules provide the machine learning algorithms, which you can customize by setting parameters.
trans-unit.target: These modules provide the machine learning algorithms, which you can customize by setting parameters.

trans-unit.source: The algorithms in this section are grouped by type:
trans-unit.target: The algorithms in this section are grouped by type:

trans-unit.source: Anomaly detection algorithms
trans-unit.target: Anomaly detection algorithms

trans-unit.source: Classification algorithms
trans-unit.target: Classification algorithms

trans-unit.source: Clustering algorithms
trans-unit.target: Clustering algorithms

trans-unit.source: Regression algorithms
trans-unit.target: Regression algorithms

trans-unit.source: Score
trans-unit.target: Score

trans-unit.source: Use these modules to pass new data through the algorithm and generate a set of results for evaluation.
trans-unit.target: Use these modules to pass new data through the algorithm and generate a set of results for evaluation.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the results of scoring as part of a predictive service.
trans-unit.target: You can also use the results of scoring as part of a predictive service.

trans-unit.source: Train
trans-unit.target: Train

trans-unit.source: These modules train an initialized machine learning model on data you provide.
trans-unit.target: These modules train an initialized machine learning model on data you provide.

trans-unit.source: OpenCV Library Modules
trans-unit.target: OpenCV Library Modules

trans-unit.source: These modules give you easy access to a popular open source library for image processing and image classification.
trans-unit.target: These modules give you easy access to a popular open source library for image processing and image classification.

trans-unit.source: R Language Modules
trans-unit.target: R Language Modules

trans-unit.source: Use these modules to add custom R code to your experiment, or implement a machine learning model based on an R package.
trans-unit.target: Use these modules to add custom R code to your experiment, or implement a machine learning model based on an R package.

trans-unit.source: Python Language Modules
trans-unit.target: Python Language Modules

trans-unit.source: Use these modules to add custom Python code to your experiment.
trans-unit.target: Use these modules to add custom Python code to your experiment.

trans-unit.source: Statistical Functions
trans-unit.target: Statistical Functions

trans-unit.source: Use these modules to calculate probability distributions, create custom calculations, and perform a wide variety of other tasks related to numerical variables.
trans-unit.target: Use these modules to calculate probability distributions, create custom calculations, and perform a wide variety of other tasks related to numerical variables.

trans-unit.source: Text Analytics
trans-unit.target: Text Analytics

trans-unit.source: Use these modules to perform feature hashing and named entity recognition.
trans-unit.target: Use these modules to perform feature hashing and named entity recognition.
